root.name: Dragon Ball: Dragon Daihikyou
root.description: OverviewDragon Ball: Doragon Daihikyou (translated to Dragon Ball: Dragon's Great Exploration) is a vertical shoot-em-up developed and published by Epoch for the Super Cassette Vision (in Japan only) on September 27, 1986. The first game in the Dragon Ball franchise (and one of the few games in the series to not be produced by Bandai), players control monkey-tailed boy Son Goku as he rides on his flying Nimbus cloud while firing ki blasts and swatting at enemies with his power pole.
